Name: Vampire Revenge
About the game: Vampire Revenge is an adult 2D game developed by Gaweb Studio. Play as a weakened vampire lord and fight your way to the top, either by fighting or seducing. Includes the following themes : blood sucking, hypnotism, fight, animated sex, maze exploration, power-ups and more! STORY Once upon a time lived a powerful vampire and his four faithful captains... Well... Not as faithful as expected since they decided to betray him... Who would have guessed ? After sealing him, they split the world in four and decided men were an eyesore... For years have men been hunted and decimated, until some villagers found the castle were the vampire lord was sealed. In such a situation, obeying a vampire seemed better than dying by the hand of crazy women. And thus, they awakened him from his long slumber... Now is time for revenge... FEATURES - Castle Management : Improve your castle to unlock more space and buy new furniture - Exploration : Mazes are randomly generated, giving infinite replayability - Battles : Kill or capture enemies. Armors can be destroyed - Sexy enemies : Girls are randomly generated from several predefined options such as skin color, hair color, hair type, breast size, and more - Survival : Suck your slaves' blood daily to regenerate your health - Power up : Unlock new vampire powers by paying the blood price - Sex : Indulge in five animated sex scenes to increase your control on your slaves, with vaginal or anal sex
